snippet.title: Most fuel-efficient cars for 2006
snippet.description:
* The Honda Insight, a gas-electric hybrid car, edged out the Toyota Prius as the most fuel-efficient vehicle in the U.S., according to new mileage ratings from the Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of Energy.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/AUTOS/10/12/most_efficient_cars/index.html

snippet.title: Study: Honda's Insight rated 'greenest' car
snippet.description:
* It is no surprise that Honda's hybrid-electric Insight remains at the top of a "greenest" car list for the second consecutive year.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/TECH/science/02/05/green.vehicles/index.html

snippet.title: Honda Insight ranked most fuelefficient car
snippet.description:
* The Honda Insight is the most fuelefficient car, according to the Environmental Protection Agency annual miles per gallon rankings. The twoseater car gets 61 miles per gallon in the city and 70 on the highway.
http://www.cnn.com/NATURE/9910/08/honda.mpg.enn/index.html

snippet.title: Honda, Toyota missing from White House 'hybrid car' event
snippet.description:
* Japanese automakers Honda and Toyota ran into a dead end at the White House Monday, when they were excluded from a high-profile promotion, intended to showcase vehicles that run on cleaner, alternative-style engines.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/ALLPOLITICS/02/25/bush.cars/index.html

snippet.title: Are you picking the right car for your wallet?
snippet.description:
* Consumers could save a nice chunk of change at the pump just by choosing carefully at the dealership, a consumer protection group said Monday.
http://www.cnn.com/2006/AUTOS/02/27/fuel_efficiency/index.html

snippet.title: Best used fuel-efficient cars under $10,000
snippet.description:
* Consumer Reports recently announced its annual used cars ratings, and we weren't surprised to see one of the major categories was "Best in Fuel Economy."
http://www.cnn.com/2008/LIVING/wayoflife/06/06/fuel.efficiency/index.html

snippet.title: Its Showtime | 111299
snippet.description:
* And if it can flaunt a bit of social conscience, all the better
http://www.cnn.com/ASIANOW/asiaweek/magazine/99/1112/motorshow.html

snippet.title: What your car says about you
snippet.description:
* Since there have been cars, people have chosen their rides based on what their cars say about them. AOL Autos put a list of cars before automotive industry experts to capture their take on several popular cars.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/LIVING/wayoflife/07/24/aa.car.says.about.you/index.html

snippet.title: Car industry struggles to ween drivers off oil
snippet.description:
* Camera flashes will illuminate sleek new sheetmetal at the Paris auto show this week, but for most of the vehicles to be unveiled, the novelty will be only skin deep.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/BUSINESS/09/25/parisoil.reut/index.html

snippet.title: Natural gas, hybrid models top 'green car' report
snippet.description:
* By Natalie Pawelski CNN Environmental Correspondent
http://www.cnn.com/2001/TECH/science/02/08/green.cars/index.html
